content:
World's favourite family quarantine video so far. Dad (of debatable age) gets into a dance challenge with daughter. Prepare yourself. (I believe no FB login is required.) 6.4 million views since Monday.

https://www.facebook.com/chris.starkey.142/videos/10158226075718874/UzpfSTM1MzAwMDQ0OjMwNjA2MTEyOTQ5OTQxNDoxMDowOjE1ODU3MjQzOTk6MzE0MTE2MDAwNDEzNzg5NjQ5NQ/

@James Agnew @Rien Wertheim I am willing to be enticed into a comparable challenge, the next time DevDays is F2F.
